title: 175: Protecting Your Brain Part 2 with Dr. Lisa Mosconi
description:
Welcome to Part 2 of this 2-part series with Dr. Lisa Mosconi! (Listen to episode #170 to hear Part 1.)

In my previous conversation with Lisa, we talked about how while there is no such thing as a gendered brain, there are differences in the brain health risks for men and women.

In this episode, Lisa is going to help us understand how we can mitigate these risks and start protecting our brains and boosting our brainpower—by using strategies that can be applied by anyone, no matter their gender.

Dr. Lisa Mosconi is an international researcher in Alzheimer’s prevention, author of the incredible new book The XX Brain, and a nutrition expert and neuroscientist.

She will take you through some extra steps you can take to protect your brains and boost your brain health. She will also explain the differences between female and male brains, including differences in health risks. She will also share with you why you should treat your brains like your best friend.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
